SEARCH
Package controller.db.impl

Class JdbcOrderDao

java.lang.Object
controller.db.impl.JdbcOrderDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderDao
public class JdbcOrderDao extends Object implements OrderDao
JdbcOrderDao is an implementation of the OrderDao interface that provides data access operations for managing orders in a relational database. This class handles the creation, retrieval, update, and deletion (CRUD) of orders and their associated order lines, utilizing JDBC for database interactions.

This class is responsible for executing SQL statements to manipulate order data, including inserting new orders, updating existing orders, deleting orders, and fetching order information based on various criteria. It uses the JdbcClientDao and JdbcProductDao to manage related client and product data.

Each method in this class is designed to throw a SQLException if an error occurs while interacting with the database.

Usage of this class requires proper initialization of the database connection settings provided in the DatabaseConf class.

Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries
